attributes.action: Get meningitis B vaccine on the routine NHS vaccine list
attributes.additional_details:
The meningitis B vaccine was licenced for use two years ago, and last March it was recommended to be provided on the NHS.
Since the licence was approved over 450 people (mainly children) have died or been left disabled from Meningitis B.
Don't let one more child die from Meningitis B, introduce this vaccine now.
Come on Novartis and the NHS, sort out your price wrangling, you're costing lives. Please sign the petition.
